Pre-Game Insights: DJ Herz will start for the Washington Nationals.
Javier Assad will start for the Chicago Cubs.
The Cubs are 15th in runs scored, 20th in batting average, 12th in on-base percentage, and 17th in slugging.
Ian Happ, Seiya Suzuki, and Cody Bellinger lead the Cubs' offensive efforts.
Christian Bethancourt has been performing well recently, hitting.571 with a double, a home run, and eight RBIs.
The Nationals are 21st in runs scored, 14th in batting average, 15th in on-base percentage, and 23rd in slugging.
CJ Abrams, Luis Garcia Jr., and Keibert Ruiz lead the Nationals' offensive efforts.
Jacob Young has hit.450 with a home run, two RBIs, two stolen bases, and five runs scored in the last week.
